message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1100000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was hoping we could come to a better agreement. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product.
I understand you're looking to make a deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $950000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $920000 for the product.

I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. I can see you're trying to get a good deal, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm willing to meet you at $930000, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand you're trying to get a fair price, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $920000 for the product, and that's my final offer.
